name: charm of strength
description: A disk of woven muscle and sinew pulses beneath ribs of black steel. The centre is mounted with a small gem glowing with pale light.

name: charm of greater strength
description: A disk of woven muscle and sinew pulses beneath ribs of black steel. The centre is mounted with two small gems, each glowing with pale light.

name: charm of magnificent strength
description: A disk of woven muscle and sinew pulses beneath ribs of black steel. The centre is mounted with three small gems, each glowing with pale light.

name: charm of dexterity
description: A disk of muscle and nerves twitches beneath ribs of black steel. The centre is mounted with a small gem glowing with pale light.

name: charm of greater dexterity
description: A disk of muscle and nerves twitches beneath ribs of black steel. The centre is mounted with two small gems, each glowing with pale light.

name: charm of magnificent dexterity
description: A disk of muscle and nerves twitches beneath ribs of black steel. The centre is mounted with three small gems, each glowing with pale light.

name: charm of intelligence
description: Hyperdense folds of grey matter cogitates, embedded within a disk of translucent resin and  black steel. The centre is mounted with a small gem glowing with pale light.

name: charm of greater intelligence
description: Hyperdense folds of grey matter cogitates, embedded within a disk of translucent resin and  black steel. The centre is mounted with two small gems, each glowing with pale light.

name: charm of magnificent intelligence
description: Hyperdense folds of grey matter cogitates, embedded within a disk of translucent resin and  black steel. The centre is mounted with three small gems, each glowing with pale light.

name: charm of perception
description: A disk of resin framed with black steel, it's inside is filled with vitreous jelly containing brachiating nerves ending in photoreceptors. It's refractive index changes intermittently through unknown mechanisms. The centre is mounted with a small gem glowing with pale light.

name: charm of greater perception
description: A disk of resin framed with black steel, it's inside is filled with vitreous jelly containing brachiating nerves ending in photoreceptors. It's refractive index changes intermittently through unknown mechanisms. The centre is mounted with two small gems, each glowing with pale light.

name: charm of magnificent perception
description: A disk of resin framed with black steel, it's inside is filled with vitreous jelly containing brachiating nerves ending in photoreceptors. It's refractive index changes intermittently through unknown mechanisms. The centre is mounted with three small gems, each glowing with pale light.

name: charm of light
description: A small lantern, in the shape of a glass globe encased in a steel cage. The glass is internally etched with frosted fractal patterns, repeating into infinity.

name: charm of stealth
description: A writhing mass of iridescent scales. Its colours are inconstant, shifting across every colour of the spectrum. It makes no sound when thumped against another object.

name: charm of unlight
description: A skeletonised hollow sphere woven from thin strands of steel and pale ceramic. Suspended in its center is a pinprick of eye-searing unlight that illuminates things not of this world.

name: lantern of unlight
description: This charm of unlight has been modified with an essence reservoir and a sturdier frame, greatly increasing its luminescence and user-friendliness. On the other hand, its greater light now draws attention from other things...

use_action.msg: You turn on the lantern of unlight.

name: lantern of unlight (on)
description: This charm of unlight has been modified with an essence reservoir and a sturdier frame, greatly increasing its luminescence and user-friendliness. On the other hand, its greater light now draws attention from other things...

use_action.msg: You turn off the lantern of unlight.
